Sieving Mechanism: Mixed-mode retention mechanisms including hydrophobic interaction, π-stacking, ion-exclusion interaction

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Column efficiency: 8.72 × 10^4 plates·m−1; Resolution: alkylbenzenes (2.54, 2.86, 4.62), PAHs (2.79, 4.83, 4.77), proteins (4.35, 2.86), amino acids (3.34)

Other Information.Additional Info: Monolithic column exhibits strong anodic electroosmotic flow, good reproducibility, and mechanical stability.
